action_details: Update to iOS 18.2; Disable "Satellite" features in settings.
Clear "Carrier Services" app cache; Hard Reboot.
Disable "Wi-Fi Calling" or "Intelligent Wi-Fi" switch.
Switch Data Mode to "Low Data Mode" to throttle heat.
Uninstall updates to "VVM" app; Clear App Data.
Reprovision IMEI in billing system; Reset APN settings.
Unpair/Re-pair Watch; "Remove Cellular Plan" and re-add.
Whitelist Short Codes (225-999); Call VZ to sync SMS Gateway.
Turn off RCS; Airplane Mode ON; Clear Msgs Cache; Turn RCS ON.
Update Carrier Settings (About > General); Dial *73 to disable forwarding.
Disable "Motion Smoothness" (Hardware bug); wait for OneUI patch.
Remove "Business Productivity" SOC code and re-add.
Factory Reset device (Pin hole); Replace Physical SIM.
Enable "Send as SMS" fallback; turn off Wi-Fi Calling for MMS.
Disable "Google Location Accuracy" (High Accuracy) momentarily.
Disable IPv6 in Router Admin (Intel NIC compatibility bug).
Manually set 5GHz channel to 149 or 157 (Non-DFS).
Check splitters (Must be 1675MHz); Reseat Coax cable.
Check "IGMP Snooping" enabled on router; Ensure same subnet.
Check RF Coax output on ONT; Replace Coax tip.
Remove 12V Battery; Press "Alarm Silence" (Blue Button).
Change "Keep Until" setting to "I delete"; Upgrade DVR storage.
Unlink/Relink Provider in App Settings; Reset VZ Password.
Check Ethernet Cable (Cat5e/Cat6); Check NIC Duplex settings.
Rotate device 90 degrees; Move to different window.
Call Support to update "Service Address" GPS coordinates.
Tower congestion; nothing user can do (Network Management).
Use Incognito Window; Unlink Fios/Wireless accounts.
Disable Ad-blocker; Try My Verizon App instead of Desktop.
File PCA (Promo Correction); Provide Submission ID.
Check "Digital Reward Center"; Resubmit receipt image.
Change plan to "Unlimited Welcome" or "Plus".
Mandatory fee on Business accounts; cannot remove.
Re-add Debit Card or VZ Visa (Credit Cards ineligible).
Re-verify via ID.me or SheerID portal; waits 1-2 cycles.
Ensure both accounts have same "Last Name" and "Billing Address".
App Glitch; check usage via #DATA (#3282) dialer code.
Toggle "Apple Music" OFF/ON in "Add-ons"; Re-link Apple ID.
Provide UPS Drop-off Receipt; Open "Warehouse Research" tkt.
Credit Request; explain "System Error" during online checkout.
Inventory mismatch; Order must be re-placed for shipping.
Type "Agent" 3 times; Select "Tech Support" not "Billing".
Schedule "Call Back" via App; Call 8 AM EST sharp.
Verify if "Authorized Retailer" (Victra/TCC); Go to Corp Store.
Wait for App Store update; Use Mobile Web (https://www.google.com/search?q=m.verizon.com).
Connect to Wi-Fi; Scan QR code provided by Chat Support.
Remove SIM; Clean contacts; Re-insert; Reset Network Settings.
Normal physics (Faraday cage); Use Wi-Fi Calling.
Use wired CarPlay (High quality cable); Disable Wi-Fi on phone.
Check Plan features (Starter Unlimited has no hotspot).
Remove battery immediately; Run on USB power if supported.
Disable "Roaming" before flight; "Wi-Fi Calling" triggers fee.
Move Extender closer to Router (White light = Good).
Stop playback on other STBs; Reboot Main VMS Server box.
Disable "Home Network Protection" in My Fios App.
Dispute condition; Request photos of damage from warehouse.
Remove via App > Add-ons; Pro-rated refund next bill.
Remove via App; Download data before deletion (30 days).
Post publicly to trigger "Social Media Team" escalation.
Update Android OS; Remove/Re-add fingerprint.
Force close "Find My"; Update iOS.
Accessibility Settings > Key Repeat > Turn Off/Adjust.
Hard Reset (Power + Vol Down); Warranty claim.
Hardware damage; Insurance claim (Asurion).
Clean port with toothpick; Clear "USBSettings" cache.
Access Admin UI; Trigger WPS Soft-button manually.
Check bill; Refresh permissions via automated phone system.
Dry port; Use MagSafe wireless charger temporarily.
Reset S-Pen (Settings > Advanced > S-Pen > Reset).
Factory Reset via Recovery Mode (Vol Down + Power).
Verify address; Request "Stop Payment" & Reissue check.
Pay immediately; Dispute mark on Credit Report.
Call Dispatch; Request $50 "Missed Appt" credit.
Use Kiosk; Use App to pay bill.
Reset via PIN sent to device; Visit store with ID.
Clear Recent Calls list; Reset Network Settings.
Disable "Adaptive Charging"; Check case thickness.
Forget Device; Charge Pencil on side; Restart iPad.
Cosmetic; Request replacement if battery exposed.
Mandatory fee; Cannot remove unless cancelling TV.
mmWave attenuation; Fallback to LTE is normal.
Check plan ("Plus" = up to 300; "Pro" = up to 1000).
Disable WPA3; Use WPA2-AES security.
Lower MTU size to 1428 on VPN client.
"Payment Investigation" request; Provide Proof of Payment.
"Tax Exemption/Correction" ticket with proof of residency.
Re-validate work email via "Connections" portal.
Unused prepaid funds do not transfer; Use before switch.
Update Profile > Accessibility preferences.
Legal (Private business); Must use Kiosk or Card.
Update iOS; Disable feature at theme parks.
Battery replacement (Hazard); Do not charge.
Check "Isolation" setting; Reboot Router.
Power cycle STB.
Auto-correct STB via Menu.
Call Billing; One-time courtesy credit.
Replace Router immediately (Overheat risk).
Switch Cellular Data Options to "5G Auto" or "LTE Only" to stop hunting for weak 5G signals.
Check "Blocked" numbers; Contact support to "Sync Messaging Profile" on account back-end.
Upgrade to "Premium" data tier (Welcome -> Plus) to regain QCI-8 (High Priority) network status.
Place GPS antenna near window; Open UDP Ports 123, 500, and 4500 on home router firewall.
Manually select a local carrier in "Network Selection" settings instead of "Automatic."
Power cycle ONT first, then Router; check for IP lease exhaustion in router admin (192.168.1.1).
Access router settings and Disable IPv6; force network to use IPv4 only for stable pings.
Move unit away from direct sunlight; ensure bottom vents are not blocked by carpet or clutter.
Contact support to "Refresh Location" if moving unit within the same home triggered a lock.
Request a "PCA" (Promotion Correction Action) form; requires IMEI of old device and tracking #.
Re-link a Debit Card or Verizon Visa; Credit Cards (non-VZ) are now ineligible for discount.
Move to a "myPlan" (Welcome/Plus/Ultimate) tier; legacy plans are being phased out via fees.
De-register the Fios ID and Wireless ID; re-register using a single, non-shared email address.
Disable "Silence Unknown Callers"; Reset Network Settings to clear stale HLR (Home Location Register).
Register number with "Free Caller Registry" (standard for major carriers) to clear reputation.
Use "C-Band" (Mid-band) instead of mmWave; move closer to a window with line-of-sight to the small cell.
Disable "Self-Organizing Network" in Fios settings; create separate SSIDs for 2.4GHz and 5GHz.
Enable "SQM" or "Quality of Service" (QoS) on a 3rd party router (Bridge Mode) to manage traffic.
Perform "STB Auto-Correction" via the Help menu on the Fios TV remote.
Use Ethernet instead of Wi-Fi; check "NAT Type" (aim for Type 2/Open) in gateway settings.
Perform "Hard Reboot" (Vol Up, Vol Down, Hold Power); check for Day-1 patch from Apple/Samsung.
Disable "HD Voice" temporarily if the other party is on a non-interoperable carrier (e.g., VoIP lines).
Enable "Maximum Data Throughput" or "4K Streaming" toggle in My Verizon Plan Add-ons.
Test with different Cat6 cable; if no link light, request router replacement (RMA).
Disable "WPS" and "SSID Broadcast"; some beacons are required for Fios TV boxes to function.
Call "Core" support to "Kill" the stuck order in the ACSS/OMNI billing system.
Manual configuration of Gateway into "IP Passthrough" mode; requires Level 3 Tech support.
Escalation to "Executive Relations" via the corporate "Contact Us" feedback form.
Update "Carrier Services" app from Play Store; Clear cache of Google Messages app.
Check "Data Switching" toggle; ensure APN settings for line 2 are correctly populated.
Re-pair via Wearable App; "Remove and Re-add" cellular plan on Apple/Galaxy Watch.
Update PRL (Preferred Roaming List) by dialing *228 (Legacy) or power cycling.
Assign a Static IP to the Extender's MAC address in your routerâ€™s DHCP settings.
Update "Share Name ID" in the My Verizon app under Line Settings.
Disable "Data Saver" mode; check for specific VZW "Video Optimizer" throttling.
Replace old Cat5e cables with Cat6; check for "Half-Duplex" errors on the NIC.
Resolutions: Clear browser cookies, use Incognito mode, or "Unlink" Fios/Wireless IDs.
Res.: Update to the latest OS-level carrier bundle (e.g., VZW 58.0+); requires back-end "Feature Add" for 5G SA on the line profile.
Res.: Filing a "Notice of Dispute"; agents can sometimes apply a 12-month credit to offset the increase if the user is on a legacy 3-year lock.
Res.: Manual "Warehouse Research" ticket; requires the UPS Tracking Number and IMEI to prove delivery and force credit application.
Res.: Replace coax splitters with 1675MHz-rated units; ensure MoCA Privacy is disabled on the primary router if using 3rd party extenders.
Res.: Technical support must "Break the Lease" manually; ONT hardware replacement required if the "Data" light remains off after reboot.
Res.: Filing a "Notice of Dispute"; agents can sometimes apply a 12-month credit to offset the increase if the user is on a legacy 3-year lock.
Res.: Clear browser cache; "Unlink" and "Relink" the accounts under a new primary email address to force a fresh database sync.
Res.: Whitelist short-code 225-999; Tech support must "Re-sync SMS Gateway" for the primary account holder's line.
Res.: Identity verification via in-store government ID; Fraud Department must "Clear the Security Flag" to restore automated provisioning.
